item.description:
contact Dena M of North Carolina for more information 919-271-3854

April 1-3, 2011
Newport Beachside Hotel and Resort
Miami Beach Hotel
www.newportbeachside.com

This is an opportunity to step and for informational purposes only.
This event is not provided by The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

  • Swag City Steppers (Waukegan)
  • D.R.D Production (Waukegan)
  •  J.E.P Productions
  •  Strictly Steppers (Chicago)
  •  North Carolina Triangle Steppers
  •  Metropolitan Steppers (Washington DC)
  •  Ain’t No Half Steppin (Atlanta)
  •  Florida’s Steppers International

 3 events – Meet and Greet Stepper’s Party,  Chic Style Stepper’s Ball and Beach/ Poolside party that includes Steppin and More

  Dance Lessons –Line, Walkin and Steppin

  Exciting Options Activities – Cruise Miami’s Intercostals, Golf, Spa Package, Shopping at Saw Grass Mall(largest outlet mall in Miami/Ft Lauderdale area) and Hard Rock Casino

SPECIAL NOTICE! Advance Tickets can only be purchase for $85 advanced price in the hospitality suite Friday April 1, 2011 from 2 to 6pm. Otherwise, door prices will apply ($30 Friday, $40 Saturday, $30 Sunday).   L.C. Henderson (Chicago): Train the Trainer Price $20

Bonita Williams (Detroit): Ladies Styling and Footwork – Enhance your individual style and ignite the personal flair in your dance

Price $20

Otis Jeferson (Keep It Smooth Entertainment-Chicago): Advance Beginner to Intermediate (Otis will have instructors to challange your level of dance)

Price $20

Lady Margaret (Chicago): Learn how to dance while you step Men and Women….steppin is not just about turns and combinations its a dance and she will teach you how to do that.

Price $20 Workshops 1 hour 30 minutes, times to be determined

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: 2nd National Chicago Style Steppers Convention
